name: Log#0099 The lost expedition
description:
Control captain Jayobi an alien soldier sent to discover what happend in earth .

controls:

player:

- x to attack, use, actions.

- c to enter/ exit mech.

- arrows to move.

- up arrow to jump.

- down arrow to dodge.

Mech controls:

- arrow to move.

- up to jump.

- down to fly.

- x to attack.

- c to enter / exit.
